title: Remco Evenepoel on Emphatic Tour de France Debut: ‘Sometimes People Don’t Realize How Much Pressure Is on My Shoulders’
content:
Third overall behind Pogačar and Vingegaard marks a stunning debut, but Belgian cycling history tells a cautionary tale.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel on Emphatic Tour de France Debut: ‘Sometimes People Don’t Realize How Much Pressure Is on My Shoulders’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
